identity.name: SocialRipple
identity.description: A Slack-native employee advocacy platform simulation.
identity.visual_style: Slack-Native Simulation (Pixel-perfect Slack clone with branded overlay elements)

font_family.interface: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

usage.headings: Manrope (SocialRipple specific panels), Inter (Slack UI headers)
usage.body: Inter (All chat messages and sidebar text)

layout.structure: Three-column layout: Sidebar (260px) | Main Feed (Flex) | Right Panel (300-400px)

buttons.slack_primary: bg-[#007a5a] text-white hover:bg-[#148567] font-bold rounded-[4px] px-4 py-1 h-9
buttons.slack_secondary: bg-white border border-[#1d1c1d4d] text-[#1d1c1d] hover:bg-[#f8f8f8] font-bold rounded-[4px] px-4 py-1 h-9
buttons.social_share: flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors

cards.message_attachment: border-l-4 border-[#E0E0E0] pl-3 ml-1 rounded-r-md bg-white
cards.demo_panel_card: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-lg p-4

steps.instruction: Create a fixed-height screen container (h-screen) with flex-row. Left: Sidebar (w-[260px] bg-[#3F0E40]). Middle: Main Content (flex-1 bg-white). Right: Demo Panel (w-[350px] border-l).
Implement the classic Slack sidebar. Header with 'SocialRipple' dropdown. Sections for 'Channels', 'Direct Messages', 'Apps'. Use the specific colors defined in design_system.colors.slack_theme.
Build the '#company-news' channel view. Header with channel details. Message list area. Input area at bottom (simulated). Create a 'BotMessage' component that renders the 'Please Share' requests.
Add the 'Share' buttons to the Bot Message. Clicking 'Share to Twitter' should open a Shadcn Dialog with a preview of the tweet and a 'Post' button.
Create the 'SocialRipple App Home'. This is a dashboard-within-Slack. Show 'Your Impact' stats and 'Available to Share' list.

universal_rules: Use 'Inter' font for all Slack UI elements to maintain authenticity.
Do not use rounded-full for avatars unless it's the status indicator. Slack avatars are rounded-md.
Ensure the sidebar color is exactly #3F0E40.
Use Shadcn components (Dialog, Button, ScrollArea, Separator, Avatar) but style them to match Slack.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
